name: Burg_10
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
salt-preserved fish staples; ritual spiced broths
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
rituals consume scarce imported reagents or specialized labour
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: near-medieval to early-industrial baseline with localized ritual magic
navigational auguries used but cannot replace charts/seamanship
